name: The Growing Tree
description:
A game about a growing tree. This Game was made within 48 hours in the Weekend Game Jam !#1.

Grow the Tree!

The Tree will use up resources as it gets older. Grow leafs and roots to replenish your resources to survive the longest!

Controls:

W, A, S, D to move Camera

Mouse wheel to Zoom

LMB to grow leaf/root

RMB to cancel
